function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of access requirements explicitly mentioned for policy measures","Impact":"Unclear eligibility criteria can lead to confusion and inequitable distribution of benefits","Mitigation":"Clearly define and communicate access requirements for policy measures","Technologies":"Policy communication and transparency platforms","People":"Companies, startups, SMEs, self-employed, government","Owner":"Government, policy makers, central banks"},{"Description":"Identification of non-unique policy measures in different media reports","Impact":"Difficulty in accurately tracking and quantifying policy measures across countries","Mitigation":"Standardize reporting of policy measures to avoid duplication","Technologies":"Policy tracking and database management systems","People":"Research teams, media organizations","Owner":"Research teams, media organizations"},{"Description":"Existential threat to companies in case of prolonged sales decline","Impact":"Potential closure of businesses and loss of jobs","Mitigation":"Financial support, business continuity planning, and economic stimulus measures","Technologies":"Financial modeling and forecasting tools, government economic relief platforms","People":"Companies, employees, government","Owner":"Government, financial institutions"}]}
